testimonials.text: LFG worked with us the start of the product’s life. From community building, to successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns and finally migrating over to our own Shopify page seamlessly
LFG helped us create an entirely new product category and to sell over 1M in product in our first month
With LFG’s guidance we were able to successfully launch Sens.ai into a new category
